item.description:
Specific Topic: Sub-Modalities and Inner Representations

This month we will feature techniques that use sub-modalities like the swish technique and like-dislike.  Working with sub-modalities, you can modify anything that has inner representions like memories or images you wish to get rid of.

There will be several demos this evening.  If anyone wishes to stop eating a particular food, this would be a great night to come!

 

Kevin Martin
978-273-5905
kenda_assoc@msn.com
www.poseffects.com

group.name: The Greater Boston NLP and Hypnosis Meetup Group

item.name: The Greater Boston NLP Meetup - Natick - Sub-Modalities and Inner Representation
